title: Trial and Error
description:
Brad Lawrence, Ariel Sherker, and Kurt Mullen share stories about a friend's breakdown, a wedding gone awry, and an estranged father.

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Faux Ferocious, Ariel Sherker, Kurt Mullen, Kevin Allison, Thundercat, Jeff Barr, The Who, Brad Lawrence)
